turns.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello, my name is John Smith. I've been having trouble with my phone—it says "No Service" at the top, and it's been like that for a few hours now. I can't make calls or anything. Can you help me fix it?

Hello John, I'm sorry to hear you're experiencing "No Service" on your phone—that sounds frustrating. To help troubleshoot this, I first need to verify your account. Could you please provide your phone number associated with the account, or your date of birth (in YYYY-MM-DD format) along with confirming your full name? Once I have that, we can check your line status and start fixing the issue.
My phone number is 555-123-2002. That's the one with the problem. My full name is John Smith.
